meanings.definition: Stephanotises: a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The stephanotises in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely bouquet of stephanotises for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The stephanotises in the flower bed seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening blossomed like the stephanotises in spring.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the stephanotises brightened up the whole yard.

meanings.definition: Stephanotises: plural form of stephanotis, a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The stephanotises were carefully arranged in the vase.
meanings.sent2: In the greenhouse, you can see various stephanotises.
meanings.sent3: The stephanotises in the garden looked like a sea of flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of stephanotises was the envy of all her friends.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the stephanotises filled the room with a sweet scent.
